title_translation.es: Aprende Vocabulario a Trav√©s de Historias - BPSC

content_translation.en:
Bangladesh's **independent** **constitutional** **body**, BPSC, conducts **recruitment** and **selection** of **eligible** **candidates** for the republic. It was **established** on 8 April 1972 and provides **appointments** in 26 **cadres** through BCS **examinations**. The **assessment** **process** is divided into three stages: **Preliminary**, Written, and **Viva** **Voce**.

Commission **chairperson** and **members** are **appointed** by the President. It not only handles recruitment but also plays a role in **eligibility** determination, promotion, transfer, and disciplinary advice.

This **institution** works to ensure **governance** **efficiency** and **neutrality**. Through **merit-based** **recruitment** and **transparency**, it strengthens the country's **administrative** **framework**. BPSC plays a **pivotal** role in achieving public service **improvements** and **effective** governance.

content_translation.es:
El **independent** **constitutional** **body** de Bangladesh, BPSC, realiza **recruitment** y **selection** de **eligible** **candidates** para la rep√∫blica. Fue **established** el 8 de abril de 1972 y proporciona **appointments** en 26 **cadres** a trav√©s de **examinations** BCS. El **assessment** **process** se divide en tres etapas: **Preliminary**, Written, y **Viva** **Voce**.

El **chairperson** y **members** de la comisi√≥n son **appointed** por el Presidente. No solo maneja el reclutamiento sino que tambi√©n desempe√±a un papel en la determinaci√≥n de **eligibility**, promoci√≥n, transferencia y asesoramiento disciplinario.

Esta **institution** trabaja para asegurar la **efficiency** y **neutrality** del **governance**. A trav√©s del **recruitment** basado en **merit-based** y **transparency**, fortalece el **framework** **administrative** del pa√≠s. BPSC desempe√±a un papel **pivotal** en el logro de **improvements** del servicio p√∫blico y **governance** **effective**.
